messages.subject: watari
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! I was reading a numbers of lone wolf and cub and found something about watari kachi and watari chugen, as the products of the transformations of samurai
messages.messageBody:
Hi!
I was reading a numbers of lone wolf and cub and found something about watari kachi and watari chugen, as the products of the transformations of samurai society during Edo period.

I wonder, did the watari kachi and watari chugen really existed?
Thanks
Edwin Angulo.
